definitions: the large bony structure near the base of the spine to which the hind limbs or legs are attached in humans and many other vertebrates.

notes.text: In humans the pelvis, connected to the base of the spine, forms a basin-shaped hollow frame at the hips, partly supporting the internal organs and providing attachment for the bones and muscles of the legs

shortDefinitions: large bony frame near base of spine to which hindlimbs or legs are attached in humans and many other vertebrates

definitions: the part of the abdomen including or enclosed by the pelvis.
shortDefinitions: part of abdomen including or enclosed by pelvis

definitions: the broadened top part of the ureter into which the kidney tubules drain.
shortDefinitions: broadened top part of ureter into which kidney tubules drain
